snippet: Thousands of people rallied in cities across Argentina on Wednesday to demand more robust action to prevent violence against women after a spate of murders.
abstract: Thousands gather in cities across Argentina to protest violence against women following wave of murders; local women's rights group working with organizers reports deaths of more than 1,800 women in episodes of domestic violence between 2008 and 2014.
lead_paragraph: Thousands of people rallied in cities across Argentina on Wednesday to demand more robust action to prevent violence against women after a spate of murders.

headline.print_headline: The Americas; Argentina: Rallies to Protect Women
